definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: A disk drive system and method capable of dynamically allocating data is provided.
sentences.chinese: 提供了能够动态分配数据的磁盘驱动器系统和方法。

sentences.english: The disk controller was chomping all day yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 磁盘驱动器昨天坏了一整天。

sentences.english: Put the disk in the drive, and boot from the CD.
sentences.chinese: 把这张盘放到磁盘驱动器里，然后从光盘启动。

sentences.english: A type of hard disk storage device in which the disk is hermetically sealed inside its disk drive.
sentences.chinese: 一种硬盘存储器设备，其中盘片密封在磁盘驱动器内。

definition: CD or DVD drive/abbr. to 光驅|光驱
drive letter (letter assigned to a disk drive or partition) (computing)

pinyin: tong1 yong4 chuan4 xing2 zong3 xian4

definition: CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
USB flash drive/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]
